mapper.sql: SPO_ID, COMMUNITY_ID, SPO_COUNTS, SPO_PRICE, RATION_COUNTS, RATION_REPAYMENT, RATION_POUNDAGE, REGISTER_DATE, SPO_DATE, IPO_DATE, RATION_SATE, RATION_TYPE, FIRM_ID
mapper.insert: insert into IPO_SPO (SPO_ID, COMMUNITY_ID, SPO_COUNTS, SPO_PRICE, RATION_COUNTS, RATION_REPAYMENT, RATION_POUNDAGE, REGISTER_DATE, SPO_DATE, IPO_DATE, RATION_SATE, RATION_TYPE, FIRM_ID) values (#{spoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{communityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{spoCounts,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{spoPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{rationCounts,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{rationRepayment,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{rationPoundage,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{registerDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{spoDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{ipoDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{rationSate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{rationType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{firmId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update IPO_SPO set COMMUNITY_ID = #{communityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SPO_COUNTS = #{spoCounts,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SPO_PRICE = #{spoPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RATION_COUNTS = #{rationCounts,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RATION_REPAYMENT = #{rationRepayment,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RATION_POUNDAGE = #{rationPoundage,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REGISTER_DATE = #{registerDate,jdbcType=DATE}, SPO_DATE = #{spoDate,jdbcType=DATE}, IPO_DATE = #{ipoDate,jdbcType=DATE}, RATION_SATE = #{rationSate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RATION_TYPE = #{rationType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FIRM_ID = #{firmId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where SPO_ID = #{spoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select SPO_ID, COMMUNITY_ID, SPO_COUNTS, SPO_PRICE, RATION_COUNTS, RATION_REPAYMENT, RATION_POUNDAGE, REGISTER_DATE, SPO_DATE, IPO_DATE, RATION_SATE, RATION_TYPE, FIRM_ID from IPO_SPO where SPO_ID = #{spoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select SPO_ID, COMMUNITY_ID, SPO_COUNTS, SPO_PRICE, RATION_COUNTS, RATION_REPAYMENT, RATION_POUNDAGE, REGISTER_DATE, SPO_DATE, IPO_DATE, RATION_SATE, RATION_TYPE, FIRM_ID from IPO_SPO

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM IPO_SPO S WHERE 1=1
AND S.COMMUNITY_ID = #{spo.communityId}
mapper.update: update IPO_SPO set RATION_SATE = 1 where SPO_ID = #{spoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
